title: Help with looking for a look-a-like font of the RED site
content:
[http://www.joinred.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202085034/http:/www.joinred.com/ "http://www.joinred.com/")  
Anyone got any clue what font does the RED site uses or is there a look-a-like?

 [‹ 'Chunky' font suggestions needed!](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202085034/http:/typophile.com/node/41420 "Go to previous forum topic") [font identification ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202085034/http:/typophile.com/node/41425 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Leog

comments.content: Any clues for a free look-a-like? (poor, maybe not so starving student here)
